text: |} The Testimonial Stakes is a Listed flat horse race in Ireland open to thoroughbreds aged three years or older. It is run at The Curragh over a distance of 6 furlongs (1,207 metres), and it is scheduled to take place each year in September. ==Winners== {| class = "sortable" | border="1" style="border-collapse:
